text: Fabian Washington (born June 9, 1983 in Bradenton, Florida) is an American former professional football cornerback. He played a total of 6 seasons in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Oakland Raiders and Baltimore Ravens. Washington was drafted out of the University of Nebraska by the Baltimore Ravens with the 23rd pick in the first round of the 2005 NFL Draft. On July 31, 2011, he signed a contract with the New Orleans Saints. On September 1, 2011, Washington suffered a hamstring injury and was placed on injured reserve. He was released from the New Orleans Saints practice squad on September 13, 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== *Fabian Washington at nfl.com Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Oakland Raiders players Category:African-American players of American football Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Fabian Washington
